sentences.chinese: 风水学宜忌篇中非凡强调反光为大凶，称反光煞。

sentences.english: One of the Four Auspicious Animals. It can stop the evil things and improve the environment.
sentences.chinese: 为吉祥四瑞兽之一，其功效能挡蔽诸煞，改善风水。

sentences.english: Then the king promoted Shadrach, Meshach, and Abednego, in the province of Babylon.
sentences.chinese: 那时王在巴比伦省，高升了沙得拉，米煞，亚伯尼歌。

sentences.english: He is too arrogant, and we must cut his comb.
sentences.chinese: 他太狂妄了，我们得煞一煞他的威风。

sentences.english: He is too arrogant, and we must cut his comb.
sentences.chinese: 他太狂妄了，我们得煞一煞他的威风。

sentences.english: One of the Four Auspicious Animals. It can stop evil things and improve your faculty of memory.
sentences.chinese: 吉祥四瑞兽之一，其功效能档蔽诸煞，改善记忆。

sentences.english: It keepsdistressing me and makes me try to think about myself.
sentences.chinese: 我因此也时时煞了苦痛，努力的要想到我自己。

sentences.english: She was struck by the incongruity of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 这一局面煞是怪异，让她惊愕不已。

sentences.english: It's so tough being handsome because girls always end up having a crush on me.
sentences.chinese: 长这么帅真是难为，因为女孩子老是煞到我。

sentences.english: And it is also a big headache to have it opened at home.
sentences.chinese: 及至拿到或运到家中，打开时也是煞费周折。

sentences.english: But, I was still waiting on final materials from Mshak.
sentences.chinese: 但我还在等待米煞把最后的资料发过来。

sentences.english: Don't know your chi from your chai?
sentences.chinese: 难道你不知道气来自煞？

sentences.english: One of the Four Auspicious Animals. It can stop the evil things and improve your environment.
sentences.chinese: 为吉祥四瑞兽之一，其功效能挡蔽诸煞，改善风水。

sentences.english: By hatred meshach red eye blade hate cannot be lame eviscerate skinning pizza.
sentences.chinese: 被仇恨煞红了眼的刀锋恨不能将萨瘸子剔骨剥皮。

sentences.english: The statue's name derives from the Ling Shang area, where the Buddha is situated.
sentences.chinese: 雕像的名字来源于泠煞嗯区，那里的佛像坐落在这里。

sentences.english: On the table, we have decided to work together to deal with heifengshuangsha.
sentences.chinese: 饭桌上，大家同仇敌忾决定一起对付黑风双煞。
